Summary: blue green light streeked over my car as i came to a stop on hwy 119 at the intersection where 119 meets 80 / 26
divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming home from a family members house with my wife around 7:30 we made our way down 119 heading east and we where about to turn left on 80 to go northwest as soon as we came to a stop i looked to my left to look for oncoming cars and in the sky far down the road about 1000 feet in the air and about 2-4 miles away was a blue green light that passed right over the car with no noise it left a trail of blue white light that faded about 300-400 feet behind it. the object made a run of about 1 mile in the sky in about 2 sec over the car and headed southeast. the entire event lasted about 7 sec i had enough time to role my window down to see it as it was coming towards us i practically was pushing my wife out the car window so she could see it but it was already gone. living in guyton i see a lot of air craft coming and going from Savannah hiltonhead airport and this was no plane if it was a meteorite in space burning up in the atmosphere it would of had bean as big as a mountain and spouting blue green light while going thousands of mph without breaking up.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Guyton
This sighting has never been favorited.
